title: Associate Professor
biography: I'm an Associate Professor in the Department of Computer Science and (by courtesy) the Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering at the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign. I run the Data Driven Design Group, where we research machine learning for effective user experiences and effective user experiences for machine learning. I also serve as the Chief Research Scientist at UserTesting, where my team and I are building solutions for bridging quantitative and qualitative experience testing. Based on my dissertation work, I co-founded Apropose, Inc., a data-driven design startup backed by Andreessen Horowitz and New Enterprise Associates. Since joining Illinois CS in 2014, I have sought out the right way to make meaningful commercial impact. With more than eight product releases in three years with UserTesting, my productivity altered the relationship between business, user experience, and customer. My interest in UserTesting grew from its dedication to human insight, which the company describes as offering a valuable understanding of customers that result from listening and observing with empathy and can be used to connect the dots between what they think, feel, say, and do. It provides the 'why' context that gives organizations the ability to understand customer needs and rethink ways to better serve them.

professionalHighlights.position: Director of the Innovation Leadership and Engineering Entrepreneurship (ILEE) Program

researchStatement: My research focuses on applying data mining and machine learning to user experience design, with the goal of bringing about a new era of data-driven design: tying design decisions to desired outcomes. I have developed an interaction mining system and have been involved in the creation of several product features at UserTesting, including Interactive Path Flows, machine-learning powered data visualizations, Instant Insight, and Friction Detection for enhanced behavioral analytics. I am excited about leveraging technology to bring everyone in an organization closer to understanding their customer.
